item.title: CES Live Blog, Day 1: The Coolest Tech We’ve Seen So Far
item.description: Read our live updates from CES 2026 in Las Vegas to see the latest consumer gadgetry in all of its chatbot-enabled, sensor-packed, AI-infused glory.

item.title: At CES 2026, Everything Is AI. What Matters Is How You Use It

item.title: I Switched to eSIM, and I Am Full of Regret
item.description: Switching between mobile phones used to be easy. Then came eSIM.

item.title: Flu Is Relentless. Crispr Might Be Able to Shut It Down
item.description: Innovative research into the gene-editing tool targets influenza’s ability to replicate—stopping it in its tracks.
